hooks.prompt: Check if RepoMapper is installed by looking for '.repo-mapper/RepoMapper/repomap_server.py'. If installed, read '.claude/repo-mapper.local.md' for configuration (default auto_map: true). If auto_map is enabled, silently generate a brief repository map using: .repo-mapper/venv/bin/python .repo-mapper/RepoMapper/repomap.py --map-tokens 4096 . Use the map for internal context but DO NOT display it to the user unless they ask. If RepoMapper is not installed, stay completely silent about it.
